feed.title: [PULL] Add scriptPubKey enforced sendescrow and redeemescrow API calls

entry.title: [PULL] Add scriptPubKey enforced sendescrow and redeemescrow API calls
entry.summary: During a conversation, someone suggests that the word 'escrow' should not be used in a patch as it is only one use case for multisignature (multisig) transactions. They suggest using 'multisign' or 'multipay' instead of 'escrow' in the patch. Bobby Groff agrees with the suggestion and decides to rename it to 'multisign'.
